snippet.title: Spirited Thief - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Spirited Thief is a tactical stealth game with a quirk: take your time to scout and plan your heist, then break in to steal pricey gems under increasing pressure.

Spirited Thief will launch in Summer 2023 on PC (Steam).

Wishlist: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1709870/Spirited_Thief/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/spirited_thief
